website_summaries.verdict: A larger tent that also includes a tunnel and ball pit.
pros: This big tent gives kids a few different ways to play
Though balls are not included, the ball pit is a decent size
The pop-up design is straightforward for easy assembly
cons: It can be difficult to fit the pieces back in the storage bag
Balls for the ball pit are not included

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler and it has been a hit. Only thing that's a bit tricky is due to the nature of it being collapsable, the side walls on the ball bit aren't going to withstand kids hanging/climbing on them. It doesn't break for us, just collapses down. It's fine for us, but may not be ok for some. Very easy to set up and take down. It's stored in a small bag. This makes it great for setting up inside when the weather isn't great outside. The balls aren't included (I almost missed this when I ordered), but there are tons of options on here for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Kid's Favorite Choice
customer_reviews.text: Bout this with theball value pack for my son's 1st b'day part and let me tell you, it did not disappoint. The children did nothing but play with this thing. It was durable and held up really well with all the activitiy. I couldn't figure out how to fold it back up to put it back in the carrying bag that it came in but I still really enjoyed the product and it will be setup in our living room for my little boy .
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old LOVES this thing, she can crawl back and forth through the tunnel and has a blast in the ball pit. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Wade

customer_reviews.title: This is my 1yo daughters favorite thing in the world right now
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1yo daughters favorite thing in the world right now, she lovesss the ball pit! It is very large and takes up most of the living room area when all three pieces are connected. The ball pit and tunnel gets the most use. Definitely something the whole family can enjoy together. Dad loves the basketball net and we've had many ball "wars". Balls are not included and you will need well over 300 balls to fill completely, we started with 150 and the bottom is hardly covered. Planning to buy more balls soon, but overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our playroom!
customer_reviews.text: We love this in our playroom for our 1 and 2 year olds. We leave the ball pit area out all the time, and hook up the tunnel and tent for more fun. It takes up a lot of space but is a lot of fun and folds up/stores very small, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! My Great-grandson went nuts when we opened this up for him! He loves it! Just be sure to purchase enough balls for the ball pit. I purchased a total of 450 & ended up being just a little shallow but enough for him to have fun!!
customer_reviews.author: JudiW3826

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got to use this this weekend. And we absolutely love it. It was such a huge hit at my daughters one year birthday. I had kids all the way to 7 years playing in it. It held up against all the rough and tumble and still looks brand new. I am so glad we got this and already have a few friends requesting it for their kiddos parties!
customer_reviews.author: Poison Irie

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's 2nd bday party and we had abt 5 of his friends show up and all of the kids flocked to this over any other toy to play with! They loved it! I ordered 400 balls but will def be ordering 400 more to make a total of 800 bc the first 400 don't go a long ways. It's not very large. Will fit fine in a standard childs room or play room! Price is great for all the entertainment it gives! I'll answer any questions on this item. Just ask below!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: We used this yesterday at my grandsons 1st birthday party. It was a huge hit with him and the other toddlers there. Held up well to all the activity.I had another parent looking it up on Amazon and ordering it while she was at the party. Does not come with balls so order at least 400 if you want them be any sort of depth. We ordered 200 and the kids enjoyed them but they spread out a lot in the tunnel. I highly recommend for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, easy folding, stores well
customer_reviews.text: WHen my grandson visits, my living room turns into a playroom and this was the centerpiece of the room. When they leave, this folds into a small flat package in a minute and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: kids loves this ball pit so much. They can spend some hours and energy in there. This ball pit is huge, but the good thing is it can separate. Depending on the space, you can set up together or separately. This ball pit is easy to set up, and it has highly quality, and the details of it is very nice. And the price is very friendly. I will recommend to everyone! This is a great gift for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew’s first birthday, and he loves playing in the pit! We bought 200 balls and it wasn’t even a single layer for three ball pit section. If you want balls, I would suggest getting no less than 500 balls. Sounds crazy, but it’s true
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very large, make sure you have space.
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy 5 bags of 200 pack balls to fill to reasonable level. Baby is learning to sit up by himself right now and his pit is useful because I can surround him with balls to help him sit up and he can reach for the balls and throw to aid in his coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Sharri M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger then I imagined it would be! I got it for my one year old (15 months) for Christmas. He LOVES it! It’s easy to fold up & put away but we just keep it in his room & move it to the living room when he’s playing in there. I put the ball pit part up bc we don’t have enough room without tripping over it! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Webb

customer_reviews.title: and was a great hit with all of the little holiday visitors
customer_reviews.text: this was inexpensive, well made, and was a great hit with all of the little holiday visitors. only negative is the basket ball hoop is so limp if wouldn't stand up enough to be used. good news is they were all so busy climbing back and forth through the tunnel no one seemed to notice/
customer_reviews.author: JHO

customer_reviews.title: and 2) absolutely LOVE IT! We had a pack of balls we ...
customer_reviews.text: It is on the "shorter" side but my boys (5, 4, and 2) absolutely LOVE IT! We had a pack of balls we never used due to the mess but now they keep all the balls inside. They love moving the balls back and forth between the 3 parts and having "snowball" fights. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter after checking multiple products. It fits in my budget and reviews are also good. This entire set came one time in a small package. This is a three piece set, it came with Triangular tent, Tunnel and Ball pit. It comes with a zip bag and the entire set fits in that bag. Balls you will have to purchase separately. The material used is of a good quality and fabric is soft. Its super easy to clean, assemble and it is portable. Definitely recommended to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a week
customer_reviews.text: My son has a blast in this ball pit, however, I've only had it a week and already 3 out of 4 of the strings you tie to hold the tunnel to the ball pit together came off, and 2 out of 4 that hold the tunnel to the tent, so I am unable to tie them together. My son doesn't play rough in it and we don't move it around, the ties literally just came off, they must not have been sewn on well. Very disappointed for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah 👽

customer_reviews.title: Collapsing Mess
customer_reviews.text: So, I really don’t get the point of this thing. It completely collapses on the child. He is 9 months and is able to get in and out from the sides of the walls and drag it on top of him. The tunnel scrunches up as he crawls. There has to be better options out there. My collapsible hamper (same idea) is sturdier. Don’t waste time or money. Positive reviews are suspicious! I NEVER write reviews, unless I’m blown away or highly disappointed, this would be the latter
customer_reviews.author: A. Leybishkis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but fell apart after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids for Christmas. I have a 2 and 6 year old, both boys. They’re definitely rough on it. After about a month it started to come apart where the tunnels connect to the ends. It’s still functional but is coming apart. My 6 year old fits in it just fine. I like that you can use the portions of it separately if you want to make it smaller. The kids love the ball pit portion. We bought 600 balls and it barely covers the bottom but glad I didn’t buy any more because they get everywhere. I’m finding ball pit balls all over my house.
customer_reviews.author: CDH

customer_reviews.title: Unfolds out large
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our twin toddlers. It is large enough for both of them to play and crawl around. However, the material is a bit flimsy. For toddlers who cannot yet stand up and walk in a sturdy manner, this will not workout. Your toddler will attempt to hold the wall and it will collapse. If your kids are a bit older and can walk steadily, then this will be fun. You will also need a lot of balls, maybe another 2-3 orders, to fill up the ball pit.
customer_reviews.author: HDN

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: This was my 9 month old big Christmas present, and it absolutely doesn't disappoint. It is easy to put together, it's made well, and my LO loves loves loves this! Heck, even my dogs love this! I put Bella (dog) in it to show LO that the tunnel is to go through and come out on the other end, and she loved it (and she's 10 years old)! When my queen B (dog) saw Bella go through it she wanted it, and she loved it! I highly recommend this product for your LO or even for your little pets! Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Orr

customer_reviews.title: Present for one year old
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son's first birthday. Cute tent, easy to set up, easy enough to take down. We have had it for a year in April...my 7 year old, 3 year old, and almost 2 year old all play with it regularly, along with their friends. Some of their friends are older (9), so it has been through some abuse, and has a couple tears now. All in all, I think it was a good purchase, was happy with it as a gift for my one year old, and would order it again. My kids are just tough on toys!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Romero

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was less than five minutes. Ball pit sides collapse when pressure is put on them, which was great for my son so he could get out if he wanted to. I bought 400 balls and it was the perfect amount. Take down wasn't difficult, but I did need to watch a video to figure it out. Fits perfectly back into the carry container. Takes up no space to store.
customer_reviews.author: Regan P

customer_reviews.title: Could use better connectors
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saving toy. I can pop this sucker up almost any time and my kids stay entertained by themselves for at least an hour. I do wish that the pieces connected with a zipper or something else because the balls pop out between the ties and the kids crawling on them unties them. If it had a more reliable connection this would be a five star review, but it's such an essential part of this assembly that is seriously lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: It’s Average
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good. My 11 month old likes it. But..... it is definitely just as wrinkly as all of the others. And no more sturdy than a cheaper one. It’s a little weird to put together. But holds ok. It did come with a stain shown in picture and a couple very tiny holes in a few places. I’m hoping it holds up at least a couple years but we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with price, quality and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for an 18 month old grandchild. INCREDIBLY easy to assembly & comes with a Cary case for storage when you take it down. Easy to fold back up for storage and the “L” shape made it easy to place in his room. The material is similar to what you see camping tents made of so I’m excited about taking it outside for family get togethers in warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Campers

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it! I set it up in our livingroom for my son's party (if using inside you will need quite a bit of space). It is super easy to assemble, but folding it back up is another story. I still have not been able to make it fit back into the bag, so we have part of it in a box in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: GoldXperience

customer_reviews.title: Tie broke on first day/wires bent and not stiff enough.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this... Then the first time I try tying the tunnel to the tent one of the strings pulls right off. Their photos make it seem like their material is superior to others and that is what I was looking for since kids are supposed to be able to play with this item right?? Also the top of the arch where the basketball hoop is located leans over significantly and is not stiff in an upright position. Ehh. Not very impressed. But my girl is young and gentle and the tent portion alone is good so I won't return it. The tunnel is good too I just wouldn't depend on connecting it to the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better for a crawling baby...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my walking 1 yearold... I wish i got it when he just started to crawl as now he tries to walk through the tunnel. I just put a soft mat and pillows into the ball pit as the sides of the pit are sooo soft that he barely puts his hand on it and the balls roll out all over the place... it does take up a large space though...
customer_reviews.author: SMSPlace

customer_reviews.title: He loved the toy but unfortunately the wire popped out on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loved the toy but unfortunately the wire popped out on the tunnel part of the toy. We tried contacting the company and sent them pictures and order number and then never heard from the company again. We are disappointed because he did enjoy the ball pit, tunnel and tent but it became dangerous with the wire poking out.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, came torn
customer_reviews.text: Cheap.. the bottom feels like tissue paper and the tunnel came torn and the metal wire exposed. So my son was excited till I had to send it back. Skip this one.. already torn and doubt it will hold up to any abuse.
customer_reviews.author: steve G 82

customer_reviews.title: i have a 2 yr old and an 11 month old and it broke easily on the first hour that they went from one ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap! cheap! made of cheap materials! i wish the tie strings that connects them together are made durable! i have a 2 yr old and an 11 month old and it broke easily on the first hour that they went from one area to another
customer_reviews.author: Cristina McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy for price. Definatly need a good amount of space to use all 3 pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get it back in the bag it came with 2 out of the 3 pieces at least. One of the Velcro connector pieces ripped away from fabric as soon as it popped open. Nephew hasn't gotten the chance to use it fully yet since balls come separately and have not arrived. Seems very easy to bend if you aren't careful when packaging back up. For price, ok I guess. Cost of balls to fill it(sold seperatly) is kinda high.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: EocuSun Polka Dot 3-in-1 Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun set for kids, folds up quickly for easy storage, and quite large when unfolded. One downfall to this product is the wire used for the tunnel frame began to protrude out about two inches after about two months of use. If you purchase, make sure to inspect the wire framing of each item prior to children playing with these so they don’t get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: 2016S550

customer_reviews.title: Fun for days!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price. It keeps my son occupied for a while with its three “rooms.” His favorite, by far, is the ball pit. I ordered a bag of 400 balls along with it, and it’s the perfect amount to fill the pit without too many balls overflowing into the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel S

customer_reviews.title: recommend: ) four stars were given solely for the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! we bought 400 balls to go inside, I would probably say 600 will fill it up completly. The tents have ties and velcro, thankfully they have the velcro as some of the ties of ripped off. We have had this play set for four months, our daughter plays in it every day and it has held up. Would def. recommend :) four stars were given solely for the reason that the ties have ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for toddlers and even my dog lol
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this even months after getting this for her! Very easy to put together and put away. I do wish the ties to toe each piece together was a bit sturdier, multiple ties have fallen off already. They are easy to see back on but just throwing that out there. Otherwise this is perfect for any toddler/kid. Definitely buy like 5000balls for it, it makes it even more fun haha
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Started to rip off the edges after a few uses. It was a Christmas gift for our 19 month son, who is a little over two years now and doesn't play with it anymore, due to the damage. It also has a flaw in the design, since the plastic balls don't stay into their hexagonal box, they overflow and get into the tunnel, since there is no boundaries there. Won't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raflex

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year old niece and 3 year old nephew love it! Got this along with the plastic balls and they play for hours. A fun way to keep the little ones entertained. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lumie

customer_reviews.title: Goid for price
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. It is flimsy. It is huge. Great for kids to tear up. Bought it for my 16 month old daughter. Bought 400 balls to go in it. I only use 200 of them (maybe even less). But 400 fills it great. Cant figure out how to get it to go back in the case though... probably user error. M.j. 67777
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not raccomend
customer_reviews.text: Well looks very nice when you open, the point is after couple days when everything star to broke. Very chip, nothing sturdiness very fragile. So far that i both i definitely do not raccomend this.
customer_reviews.author: Davide Zuccherino

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive but in a good way. It’s bright and fun and my one year old thinks it’s really fun to sit in. The quality is decent for the price. I don’t know how long it will last but for $40 bucks it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Teagen T.

customer_reviews.title: Ties That Connect the Parts Are a Setback
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept so much, just seems very 'cheap.' There are 3 parts to this. Each part is held together with ties. They don't stay together well at all, and I'm afraid they will rip off soon. Would be an absolute 5 if it were higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Great if u don't have normally hyper children. The straps broke off very quickly and the velco comes undone a lot, leaving balls to spill out everywhere. Otherwise, my kids love it. The tunnel is on the smaller size though. My 5 and 6 year.old can fit but the 6 year old is very lean. My niece and nephew who are on the bigger size but same ages can't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Leia Mah

customer_reviews.title: I should've thought about this more...
customer_reviews.text: Man, the whole ball pit thing is messy. The kids keep throwing the darn balls out! They're all over my house now. I'm finding them everywhere! No fault with the product so far, but it's only been a week.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Dangerous exposed metal wiring!
customer_reviews.text: Warning!! This product is poorly made and VERY dangerous. There are metal wires that pop out on each piece and can be very harmful to your child. My son got caught on a wire poking through the tube part of the play house and ripped his pants and cut his thigh. I would not purchase this item again and urge you not to. See pics below for example of exposed wires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball pit my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my one year old for his birthday he loves it I ordered a total of 800 balls for it after reading some reviews for just the ball pit 400 is enough but for the rest of it you’ll want the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this. It's not super durable but it does the job. For the price was really happy with it. The bigger tent is a little hard to fold into a small circle but all 3 pieces collapse easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mom.RN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pups!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my two pups and they absolutely love it! Keeps them entertained and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Nice.My babes love it. I put this in my bedroom. Now my living room all full. And I will keep buying balls and form pet under this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but wish it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this thing. So easy to pick up and put away. Not very sturdy and doesn’t look like it’ll last long, but still worth the buy, in my opinion. It keeps our girls busy for a while and they’re super engaged and excited the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Geehan M

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: It has 2 small tears, but it could be from adult horseplay with the kid. It's definitely a good value for the price though. Little hard to fold, but it goes back in the carry bag eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Waddington

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fun toy that helped us survive winter with a one year old!
customer_reviews.text: Suck a fun toy for our one year old! We bought 300 balls which seems to be perfect. Insanely quick setup.The only negative I have is the 3 pieces tie together and the seams where the ties are ripped pretty quickly. Totally recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 19 month old. She likes it enough. My only complaint is that it isn’t strong enough to withstand regular play of my 19 month old and my 3 year old niece. I tied the tunnel and put together with the sewn in ties and they have ripped off. So now the balls spill out and we have to constantly put the balls back in.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great design and fun for kids, but the material is not strong enough. It's broken after my daughter using for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: The ties broke off the second day and my grandson is only 12 months old he wasn’t doing anything other then crawling through the tunnel
customer_reviews.author: PamAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, bigger than I expected but my daughter loved it and she can only crawl and it was very easy for her to get in and out of by herself.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca thomas

customer_reviews.title: Straps break. Fun tent
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tent and will spend the whole day in it. Dont expect it to keep your younger child contained as the walls collapsed very easily (as you would expect from a tent). Aftwr a few uses, the tie straps used to connect the pieces ripped, but I just sewed on some ribbon and all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine A Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Big, cokorful & fun
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than i expected! Great for my 7mo! As long as we don't rip the material, this play area should last a while. Buyer may want to buy about 100 more balls.(i did) Each section velcros and ties together at the openings.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good game tent. When I installed, I gave my two children a surprise and they were very happy after seeing it. It is easy to install and remove. It is packed in a small bag. Very convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Lin

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. He climbs over the sides, hangs on it, uses and abuses this thing and it holds strong. Would definitely recommend. We bought with the crush resistant balls and this tent has definitely stood the test of time. During his first birthday there were 8 kids playing in it and was the center of the party.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Sarnese

customer_reviews.title: Great ball pit option for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our little guy for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! Plays in it everyday and our dogs love chasing him back and forth through the tunnel as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but poor quality check
customer_reviews.text: I received the ordered item and first thing I noticed while opening the package was the stitches which almost came off from the tunnel. And while assembling it I noticed that one Velcro was wrongly stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: cheap hamper like material
customer_reviews.text: would rate 0 stars if I could. it smelled like fish..made of cheap material..the straps easily snap off. will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good Use!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! What sucks is it doesn’t come with balls so I had to buy them separate. And it takes a little time tying everything so that it’s put together. But other than that she loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Varner

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t looking for anything super extravagant mostly because I was buying this for a toddler and they are destructive by nature. However I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this product for the price!!! My sweet sweet nephew adores this!!!! Also really like that you don’t have to have the whole thing out all at one time! Definitely suggest you get this!
customer_reviews.author: CRH079325

customer_reviews.title: My baby loved the simple more than this crazy thing
customer_reviews.text: In first use of this product the little blue straps just tore right off. Go for the cheaper ball pit. My baby loved the simple more than this crazy thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining and great for getting your child to move.
customer_reviews.author: dfleming

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just like pictured, love the case for it. However the basketball hoop part flops over quite a bit. Which is kinda irritating, but my kids love it. However if you order balls order 500. I got 200 and it wasnt nearly enough lol.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Arnold

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with the
customer_reviews.text: the ties don't keep the connecting pieces together very well and balls fall out all the time, also the wire came out of the tunnel portion very quickly & we had to throw away. disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My one, three and even five year olds love this. Only gave four stars because within two days the Velcro pieces that help keep the tunnel and the ball pit connected tore.
customer_reviews.author: Nursemomma

customer_reviews.title: fun times
customer_reviews.text: This was chose by my husbands daughter for the grandbabies 1st year birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Rehe

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great value my kids love this and play with it for hours! It’s well made and so far there hasn’t been any tearing and my cat runs and plays in it! Surprisingly sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very cute & nice. It is a little flimsy but as is any tent with this material. My 1 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Toddler and cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves it as does our cat! It’s a little hard to fold the ball pit part but overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori H.

customer_reviews.title: Was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my granddaughters, they absolutely love this. Very good investment. Seems to be really good quality
customer_reviews.author: Nicole gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Fairly flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and flimsy, the sides collapse without much effort, so the ball pit is fairly useless. Otherwise it is fine for the tunnel and tent. Just extremely lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Metal ring that lines the tunnel
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel ring is lined by a hard metal that hurts when walking over it. Our 9 month old also barely fits through the tunnel
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Im only giving everything a 4 star because i havent used it yet. Everything looks perfect though!!! Great gift for the little ones. Five star for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Just wish there was a way to use the ball pit without the tunnel and tent. Without them, the balls roll every where.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe, exposed metal wire
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but cheaply made. Metal wire started poking out of tunnel with months. Daughter scraped herself on exposed metal. Not safe.
customer_reviews.author: joejoe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for small kids
customer_reviews.text: my grandsons love this.. 4 and 1. They crawl around and play tag in it..lol
customer_reviews.author: Trina Kurzyniec

customer_reviews.title: This play tent was huge hit for my daughter's first ...
customer_reviews.text: This play tent was huge hit for my daughter's first birthday party. Doesn't include the balls, but those are cheap enough. It's withstood more wear and tear than I ever thought it would with kids aged 1-14 playing in it and two cats at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but be careful...
customer_reviews.text: This ball pit and Tent is really nice, baby doesn’t like playing it as much as we thought he would, might be for when he gets a little older. I will warn you that it jumps out at you like a snake when you unzip the bag. We weren’t expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! Most of the Pieces are easy to fold back up but there is one that for the life of me I can not get to fold back up. Other than that it has been great
customer_reviews.author: Britt houser

customer_reviews.title: fun time , kinda difficult
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, my 1 year old sister enjoys this ! Quality is alright basically what I expected , I did have a lot of difficulty actually trying to put it back into the bag and the zipper broke off the bag really easily but the actual structure is nice and fun for kids !
customer_reviews.author: arie

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The units don't stay together and the strings that tie them in place break off easily. Not very toddler durable. Worked for the birthday party but didnt last a week in the playroom.
customer_reviews.author: letlifelive

customer_reviews.title: Very thin cheap material and not really sturdy. My 10 month son can bend the wall ...
customer_reviews.text: Very thin cheap material and not really sturdy. My 10 month son can bend the wall of the ball pit and crawl out. Also the tunnel is very small around, he can crawl in it but a older kid wouldn't fit well. Also the handle on the bag ripped off when we were putting it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is so poorly put together. The connectors all ripped within minutes of being put together. A new way to connect the tunnel to both ends is needed. Maybe some snaps with stronger stitching.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ❤
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My toddler loves this!!! It's an inexpensive,perfect little gift! We bought it for my 15 month old and can definitely see her loving this for a few more years.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a run for our guinea pigs and they love it. It's huge and easy too assemble. I highly recommend this. I'm sure it'd be great for kids too lol
customer_reviews.author: Beth McFarland

customer_reviews.title: I think I like it more than my granddaughter does
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it more than my granddaughter does. It's super fun. Easy to set up (not so easy to tear down) and loads of fun. She does love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dog to play in am he loves! It’s a nice pattern but a little on the flimsy stuff side. It won’t last a year. Two of the ties have ripped off already.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten

customer_reviews.title: Decent toy. However I ordered a purple one and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun for kids, but stitching starting to tear after 2 weeks. Also I ordered a purple one and received a red one, and it is too late to return since the box was opened and toy was set up for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's 1st birthday and it was worth EVERY PENNY. All the kids wanted to do was play in this awesome pit, gave the parents some time to relax - truly enjoyed by all! I know my daughter will continue enjoying it for the next couple of years. I purchased two set of 200 balls and only placed them in the open pit so haven't had any trouble keeping them in. I'd recommend more if you want to fill both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Melenric

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sons first birthday. Size is perfect, however we opened it today and put it together. Quite a few of the attachment strings broke within seconds of putting it together so now the pieces will only attach with the Velcro and it doesn’t stay attached very well.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: The wire support in the play tube came out on ...
customer_reviews.text: The wire support in the play tube came out on both ends after very little use causing a serious hazard for my 1 year old. not at all safe for young Children
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gardner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it broke after one use. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a couple hundred separately and still feel like it could use more
customer_reviews.text: my niece and nephew have a blast in this! You have to order A LOT of balls though! I ordered a couple hundred separately and still feel like it could use more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EocuSun Kids Play Tent,Ball Pit Tent with Crawl Tunnel for Boys, Girls, Babies, and Toddlers, with Zippered Storage Bag for Indoor and Outdoor Use(Red)
feature_bullets: ★Roomy:Consist of tent house, tunnel and ball pit pool. The 3pc playhouse for kids create a fun filled playground for child to crawl and play, improve baby’s independent ability. (BALLS NOT INCLUDED).

★Safety:Soft fabric with non-toxic and odorless colorful polka dot printed allows for a safe & environmental friendly playhouse for the kids. Breathable mesh design visualize the view inside for watching out, Mosquito-proof.

★Durable & Portable:Flexible and firm steel holder with safe hose. Doubly-sewed and washable polyester fabric is highly resistant to wear and tear. Quick & Easy to set up, fold and store. Lightweight with a zipper storage case.

★Multifunctional:Best toddler toys for birthday parties, parks, picnics, backyard BBQs, playgrounds, day care, school, carnivals, sleepovers, indoor or outdoor play! Great for pets as well. The tunnel, tent & ball pit can be used together or separately.
★Size:117"(L) X 47"(W) X 39"(H) (unfold size); folded package size: 20"(D).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars901 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
